CompleteAccount.body:
{{{name}}}, it's Seasons. You're in. You'll soon have access to hundreds of new styles without the stress of commitment.

To finish setting up your membership, login at {{{webChoosePlanLink}}}, then select a plan. 

Due to demand, your invitation will expire in 48 hours. If you have any questions please contact {{{contactEmail}}}.

TwentyFourHourLeftAuthorizationFollowup.body:
Hi {{{name}}}, — one last update from Seasons. In 24 hours you’ll be placed back on our waitlist until another membership slot is available. If you do choose to activate, your subscription can be paused at any time.

Our flexible membership options start at $65/month. Learn more and browse our full inventory on wearseasons.com.

As always, feel free to contact {{{contactEmail}}} with any questions.

Rewaitlisted.body: Hi {{{name}}}, your Seasons signup window has closed. If you’d still like to activate your account at any point, you can request authorization directly in the Seasons app (wearseasons.com) or by sending us an email at {{{contactEmail}}}

ResumeReminder.body:
Hi {{{name}}}, it's Seasons. Your account is set to resume on {{{resumeDate}}}. 

Reply "1" to extend your pause by 1 month, "3" to extend it by 3 months, or "resume" to restart it immediately. 

If you have any questions, please contact us at {{{contactEmail}}}.
